content: A lot of these suggestions (bike, walk, run) for either transportation or exercise would depend on living somewhere that has a climate where it is reasonable to do. If you live somewhere with 8 months of winter those things are not awesome. Technically doable sure, but for me the key to actually getting exercise was finding something that I didn’t haaaaaaaaaaate and trying to run, walk, or bike would basically be torture for me and I would end up just not doing it.
